description: A drawer that can be swiped in from the left edge of the screen. There's only a single instance that can be accessed via `tabris.ui.drawer`. The drawer is locked by default. To use it in an application, set the property `locked` to `false`. The drawer can contain any kind of widgets.

open.description: Fired when the drawer is opened and has reached its resting position.

close.description: Fired when the drawer is closed and has reached its resting position.

enabled.description: Controls whether the drawer can be opened and closed. When set to `false`, the drawer cannot be opened and calls to `drawer.open()` will be ignored.

open.description: Opens the drawer. It may be useful to call this method on first startup, so that users notice the drawer and its contents.
